snippet.title: Family Trainer Treasure Adventures - Wii - Gamescom 2010 Trailer
snippet.description:
Take you Mii and live adventures with a big A. Family Trainer Treasure Adventures invites you for a survival Jumping session, a giant Octopus fight, an horse riding pursuit and a scuba-diving race in this gameplay trailer.  The game has 20 mini-games to have fun with up to four friends and an original adventure mode with 70 missions.

Family trainer Treasure adventure is scheduled for October 2010 exclusively on WII.
More information on your local http://www.namcobandaigames.eu website.
